评论详情: This shirt looks cute in the pictures, but the quality is really bad and not at all worth the $25 price tag. The fit is supposed to be loose, but I found it to be ill-fitting and smaller than expected, based on the size chart. The fabric is really scratchy and feels super cheap. It is 100% polyester, but the absolute worst kind. You really feel like you are wearing plastic. If you really love the look of the shirt and want to order it, I would suggest you size up and wear a shirt underneath, so your skin isn't in direct contact with the fabric. Otherwise, don't waste your money on this.

This is a Feminan and Elegantly Designed Blouse. It has a necline that is pleated, with precise small stitching, with open keyhole button closure in the back. For this reason only, it may not be suitable for persons dealing with arthritis or similar painful joint diseases. I have Fibromyalgia and pain comes & goes, but still able to wear this. The material holds its rose/dusty pink color, very well through several machine washings. It is also lightweight, but long sleeve & great for Autumn/ Winter wear. There is also with Some Stretch to the Fabric...Priced Very Reasonably and Well Worth The Cost @ $25.00, Range.

This top is pretty and would be nice as a solid color, simple top but, I’m not sure it will ever become a favorite of mine due to a few issues I experienced..  First off i have to mention the button and loop on the back of the neck. It is there to pull in and secure the higher neckline which in concept is a cute idea but in reality, it’s very poorly done. The elastic loop, that goes over the button, is WAY too small. I fussed with it for a while when putting on the shirt.. i have long nails and it was incredibly hard to get the loop over the button. But, the real frustration came when trying to get it off. I literally couldn’t get it off which meant I couldn’t get the shirt off.. when buttoned, I can’t get it over my head. So, I tried to have someone help me unbutton it but even they couldn’t get it. So eventuality i just had to cut the loop just to get the shirt off. So now my shirt has a cut loop that I’m honestly too busy to fix. I am sure I’ll get around to it but i only wore the shirt that one time. Really annoying that such a small detail could practically ruin the top. The loop doesn’t need to be small for any reason and, i can’t wear the shirt unbuttoned because, well, it looks undone obviously. I did notice other reviewers mentioned that they had this issue, I wasn’t sure if it was just my shirt but, this does seem to be a common enough problem/flaw and something to keep in mind.  Otherwise the shirt fit well. The color is beautiful. I didn’t find the top to be super soft but it’s not uncomfortable by any means. The only place that’s a tad uncomfortable is the elastic around the wrists. The shirt fit properly but the elastic was a little too tight around my wrists. The top is also decently made. Seams are straight and i didn’t notice any defects. The style is flattering but I personally think it’s a little boxy untucked. I wore it tucked in and it looked cuter.  Overall, i think it’s a fine top but since i only got to wear it once and then had to literally cut it off, I can’t give it more than an average rating of 3 stars..

评论概述: Butterflies n is IMPOSSIBLE. Looks blah on - sleeves nice and long
评论详情: I am tempted to rate it lower, but the shirt is just not for me. It just looks blah on. There’s no styling to the front and it just does nothing for me tucked or untucked. Which is a shame because I think the color is fabulous. The material is nice and flowy and very feminine.  I always order up a full size or a few sizes to get that flowiness and I am also tall so I try to get more length that way as well. The sleeves are definitely very long for this tall girl - that I am very pleased with.  The button that you have on the back is impossible to button. It is the tiniest tiniest little stretchy loop and a big giant button. And good luck as once you do get it buttoned, it is impossible to get it unbuttoned. So I think I’m going to attach a little snap to this instead. But then again, I may just give the shirt away because it just looks flat on me. There’s no styling to the front there’s no… I’m not too happy with it but again, it may work for you.  Had potential at least. I do wish the neck line was different for that. The breast area was pleated differently, or that there was some kind of shape to it, but it just looking flat and blah on me…

评论概述: Light weight, but kind of itchy
评论详情: This is very pretty and fits as stated. However the fabric is kind of itchy. Still a good color and will be worn.

I ordered the Aifer Women's Frill Mock Neck Puff Long Sleeve Blouse for my daughter; she said it boasts an attractive and stylish design that will turn heads. Its primary strength is its versatility, making it suitable for casual events and more professional settings. It compliments the wearer’s figure beautifully and has a delightful color that adds to its overall appeal. Furthermore, despite its delicate appearance, it holds up well to machine washing and drying, which is a significant plus for ease of maintenance.

It's a nice top, pretty. It was a little snug even by going by their sizing. The one thing I don't like is the neck. It had a little button in the back, which makes it right around the neck. It was too tight for my comfort, I felt like i was being choked. (In the picture I have it unbuttoned). It has the ruffling on the top, which buggsy kept bugging me. When I had it unbuttoned it was a lot more comfortable though.

Wearing this long sleeve shirt with my black or white pants made me look professional. This is beautiful. The material is lightweight and comfortable to wear. I got blue in a medium size and it is just right for me. I love it! I recommend!

This blouse is very classy. It’s made out a little thinner material, so definitely need an undershirt with it. Living in a very warm climate, I was still very comfortable going out with this blouse on. It provides great coverage. It’s made very well and washed up nicely on delicate cycle and low heat in the dryer. The stitching is nice.

This top is lightweight and has a crepe-y texture. It would look good for dress or casual. It is true-to-size and has comfortable elastic at the sleeves. It has a keyhole opening at the back and it closes with a little elastic band so it is not difficult to button yourself.

The fabric is a light weight crepe that feels a little rough but is not scratchy.  The Medium size fits me well. I am 5'4", 140 pounds.  I would consider it a dressy shirt.  I have washed it several times and was not able to get the original wrinkles caused by the packaging out without a cool iron.  It is line dry only and does not wrinkle easily.  This would be a good blouse for a business trip.

This is a very nice blouse.  I wore it to work everyone complimented me on it.  It is a little on the thin side.  I did wear something under it.  But I still like this top.  Perfect for the summer due to it not being thick.

Very pretty shirt. It will work great for an evening out or day at the office. I washed it and dried it (medium heat) by machine and it came out just fine. I only found two minor issues: 1-It is polyester so tough wrinkles will have to be ironed out (the big ones didn’t come out in the dryer). 2-I wouldn’t say it’s a soft shirt but it’s also not uncomfortable. I am pretty sensitive to fabrics so it took me a few minutes at first to get used to the feel of this, but it was fine after that.  I ordered a size small and am 5’7 and roughly 125 pounds. Small fit well.  I love that it’s different looking and pretty and fashionable. Very happy with it overall!

评论概述: Attractive.  Sizing Chart = A little Smaller Than Expected.  Sleeve Length Just Long Enough.
评论详情: The women’s pleated front long puff sleeve business top for fall (ASIN: B0C8LVD9H9) is attractive and comfortable.  The slightly puffed sleeves are cute and I like the pleated front.  The sleeves are tight at the wrist.  Note that the material is a little thin, and a patterned bra is visible through it up close. Not something I want in a business environment.  However, taking that into consideration, overall, it is a good look for business wear.I used the sizing chart in the product description and based on that ordered a medium.  I am still not sure, but I am thinking I should have gone with a large, my normal size.  It is a little tight in the body.  The front pleats are starting to expand, so I will likely wear a minimizer bra with this top.  and the sleeves are just barely long enough.
This is a great blouse to wear to work. It fits perfect in the arms and body. Nice color and lightweight. It’s a great shirt for the summer because it is lightweight.

This shirt is casual but yet elegant. It is an XL and true to size. I am 5'4, 38DD, and 200lbs. It is made with great quality and if properly taken care of, it will last years. I will be ordering the other colors I like it so much.

This blue blouse is very feminine and demure looking.  There is a small ruffle at the neckline and the sleeves are gathered at the wrists ending in a ruffle giving it a very dressy look.  There is also pleating down the front of the blouse.  Although I ordered this in my size, the sleeves at the top were too tight.  The fabric of the material has a subtle nubbing.

This fabric of this blouse is nice and stretchy in a very good way, which makes it very comfortable to wear. It also makes it fit nicer because although it stretches, it has good structure. It kind of reminds me of a very stretchy crepe like fabric. The color representation is accurate. The button at neck in back is hard to button close, so I just leave mine closed , but am still able to put it over my head. Another plus for stretchy fabric. Blouse came a little wrinkled, but the wrinkles came out nicely and the blouse doesn’t wrinkle easily. I would say it’s true to size.

I like the style of this top. It fits as expected. I usually go between a small and a medium, and I ordered the small- and it fits just as I expected. It is a nice shirt for the fall season, can be dressed up or down, depending on how I want to style it. The fabric is very light and flow-y, and is loose enough around the tummy area, which I like! It doesn't feel itchy in the skin either. Will be great to wear at the office or church.

Sorry for the bad photo, my selfie stick broke and this is the best I can do. But the shirt...I love it! The material has the feel of chiffon, it's very light weight and drapes beautifully. The shoulders have a slight puff to them, and the stretch gathering at the wrists is comfortable and not tight or binding. I'm 5'8" and weigh 150lbs. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly! This is going to look fantastic with tights or jeans! To me, its dressy, so I will wear it when I'm going somewhere nice. It's a bit too warm for summer in Florida, but it is definitely a 3 season blouse for down here! 2 thumbs up from me!
This top is just so pretty! The fabric is a textured, gauzy feel. It is nice and light, but not see through. The pleating on the front is gorgeous. I love the lantern type sleeve.
Fits true to size. Very lightweight. Comfortable. Looks great with jeans or dresses up. Perfect wardrobe staple.

评论概述: Great color! Super bright and cute on.
评论详情: I love the look of this shirt. The material is not super nice, but it isn't itchy so I don't mind it. Not sure how long it will last. Feels like something you would buy at H and M or Forever 21. It is flattering on and a great color.
